messages: Major Update: We've added DeepSeek & Devstral models, fixed the login crash, and introduced Core Memories!
changes:
• New Models: DeepSeek V3.1, R1 Chimera, and Devstral
• Added Core Memories (Global persistent facts)
• Added Real-World Time & Date awareness
• Fixed critical security crash & login bypass
• Upgraded Auth System to v1.3
